article_text: The U.S. Supreme Court term that starts the first Monday in October will mark the 10th anniversary of John Roberts's introduction as chief justice. He can celebrate by reflecting on the assertion by Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz that Roberts should never have been nominated.

article_metadata.title: Principled justice | Columbus Ledger-Enquirer

article_summary:
He can celebrate by reflecting on the assertion by Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz that Roberts should never have been nominated.
The U.S. Supreme Court term that starts the first Monday in October will mark the 10th anniversary of John Roberts's introduction as chief justice.
